OrgName.entry: SOUTH YORKSHIRE HEALERS AND YORKSHIRE MEDIUMS

Desc.entry: Endeavours to raise the standards of healers, mediums and psychics by providing training and insurance. Holds regular meetings, healing exchanges and workshop days. Also runs Sheffield Paranormal Investigations (SPI), see separate entry.

category.entry: CLAIRVOYANTS, TAROT CARD READERS AND MEDIUMS
